description: AriZona Beverages sells its 23 oz cans of iced tea for 99 cents, the same price since its 1992 launch. The company's founder and chairman Don Vultaggio shares strategies they've implemented to offset cost, and why they've maintained this price point amid risi…
title: How AriZona Beverages has kept iced tea prices at 99 cents for 30 years

title: Inflation in Canada hit 7.7 per cent in May: StatCan - CTV News
content:
OTTAWA - Statistics Canada says the annual inflation rate skyrocketed to its highest level in nearly 40 years in May, fuelled by soaring gas prices.
